recipe.title: Mon and Chloes Stir Fried Noodles
recipe.ingredient: 1 TBsp each sweet chilli, fish, oyster sauce
recipe.step: Make sauce and set aside. Cook noodles per packet direction, then set aside. Heat wok and heat a small amount of oil. Cook the garlic for 3 minutes. Place veggies in pan and stir fry until veggies cooked. Place noodles in the pan with the sauce. Stir together until blended and heated through. Serve with bean shoots, spring onion and coriander sprinkled on top.
